title: Secrets of nature: summertime meadow
creator_credit: British Instructional Films and Associated British-Pathe
brief_description: Views of typical animal and plant life to be found in an English meadow during summer; ladybirds feeding on aphids; meadow flowers and pollination by bees; snails; grasses and grasshoppers; the looper caterpillar, drinker moth and millipede; swallow-tail butterfly; burnet moths; blue, marbled white, fritillary butterflies; various types of meadow grasses.
